etymons.meaning: jeter quelqu'un çà et la, faire errer dans le monde

Preterit.turoyo: mṭawṭaḥle ruḥe b-i=kow-áyo-wa laltaḥ Lu b-aq=qayse qṭilole i=aṯto hayo-ste w-mḥalaqqe a=tre mṭawṭḥənne bayn u=talg-awo mḥalqənne larwal Lu
translations: da liess er sich durch diese Dachluke hinab
‘He (the husband, m.) killed his wife with a club, and they (husband and his acquaintance) threw the two bodies (of wife and her lover) outside, in the snow’

tokens.value: ʻda liess er sich durch diese Dachluke hinabʼ
b-aq=qayse qṭilole i=aṯto hayo-ste w-mḥalaqqe a=tre mṭawṭḥənne bayn u=talg-awo mḥalqənne larwal
‘He (the husband, m.) killed his wife with a club, and they (husband and his acquaintance) threw the two bodies (of wife and her lover) outside, in the snow’

Preterit.text: mṭawṭaḥle ruḥe b-i=kow-áyo-wa laltaḥ ʻda liess er sich durch diese Dachluke hinabʼ 793; LuF 280/22; b-aq=qayse qṭilole i=aṯto hayo-ste w-mḥalaqqe a=tre mṭawṭḥənne bayn u=talg-awo mḥalqənne larwal ‘He (the husband, m.) killed his wife with a club, and they (husband and his acquaintance) threw the two bodies (of wife and her lover) outside, in the snow’ LuF 282/27;

translations: ʻda liess er sich durch diese Dachluke hinabʼ

segments.turoyo: b-aq=qayse qṭilole i=aṯto hayo-ste w-mḥalaqqe a=tre mṭawṭḥənne bayn u=talg-awo mḥalqənne larwal Lu
translations: ‘He (the husband, m.) killed his wife with a club, and they (husband and his acquaintance) threw the two bodies (of wife and her lover) outside, in the snow’
so warf er denn Steine nach ihm und vertrieb ihn (vom Grabe)

tokens.value: ʻso warf er denn Steine nach ihm und vertrieb ihn (vom Grabe)ʼ

Infectum.text: ko-moḥe-le b-ak=kefe ko-mṭawṭaḥ-le ʻso warf er denn Steine nach ihm und vertrieb ihn (vom Grabe)ʼ; 793; 61/49;

translations: ʻso warf er denn Steine nach ihm und vertrieb ihn (vom Grabe)ʼ
